[Oportunidade 1]
Oportunidade: Generative AI Orchestration Engineer

Sobre a vaga
We are seeking a highly skilled and innovative Generative AI Orchestration Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of AI technologies and a proven track record in developing and deploying advanced AI solutions. You will be responsible for designing, building, and optimizing our AI systems, ensuring they perform efficiently and effectively. This role requires a blend of technical expertise, creativity, and the ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.

Key Responsibilities: 
Develop and Implement AI Kernel: Develop and maintain the foundational job queue and task scheduler, ensuring robust and efficient task management within the AI system. 
Develop AI Broker Framework: Create and optimize a framework for intelligent model selection and invocation, maximizing performance and cost-effectiveness. Implement intelligent error correction mechanisms. 
Build and Manage AI Gateway: Integrate various data sources into the system and develop function-calling capabilities. Establish and maintain connections to databases, internet search, and external APIs. 
Enhance Cognitive Architecture: Implement advanced AI features such as working memory, planning, and problem-solving capabilities to enhance the system's intelligence. 
Create Agent Framework: Develop a framework enabling the AI to operate semi-independently, executing high-level instructions similar to a human remote employee. 
Develop Preconfigured Modules: Design and deploy various ready-to-use modules, including document extraction, coding sandbox, and chat functionalities, tailored to specific applications. 
Implement Learning Framework: Create and maintain a learning framework that allows the AI system to improve automatically over time, incorporating feedback and new data. 
 Qualifications: 
Proven experience in designing and developing AI systems, with a focus on generative AI technologies. 
Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, Java, or C++. 
Experience with AI/ML frameworks and libraries (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch). 
Knowledge of AI model selection, optimization, and error correction techniques. 
Expertise in data integration and API development. 
Understanding of advanced AI concepts such as working memory, planning, and problem-solving. 
Ability to design frameworks for semi-independent AI operation. 
Experience in developing and deploying preconfigured modules for various applications. 
Familiarity with frameworks for continuous learning and improvement of AI systems. 
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities. 
Education: Bachelor's or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, or a related field. 
Relevant certifications in AI/ML technologies are a plus. 
 Preferred Qualifications: 
Advanced Degree: Master‚Äôs in Computer Science, Linguistics, AI, or a related field. 
Industry Knowledge: Experience in specific industries such as healthcare, finance, customer service, etc., to tailor AI solutions to industry-specific needs. 
 Soft Skills: 
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. 
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 
Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 
Strong organizational and time management skills. 
 Benefits: 
Competitive benefits. 

About the Zaaz Collective: 
Zaaz is building a company that‚Äôs tailor made for today‚Äôs modern marketer. There are two interconnected components of our offering: 
  A company with the best creative and marketing talent from both the U.S. and Brazil. 
A suite of AI-enabled products designed to allow marketing leaders to build workflows, blending the best of humans and machines, for faster and more efficient marketing. 
 Our founding team has decades of agency experience and a long track record of building deep client relationships. With the rise of AI, we see an opportunity for marketing decision-makers to redesign their processes to make the most of their people and this new wave of technology. We know the old way of billing clients and overworking staff with billable hour targets is a thing of the past (or, at least, it will be soon). That‚Äôs why we created the Zaaz Collective to build a new company tailor-made for today‚Äôs modern marketer. 
 With a new tech-first (instead of hours-first) delivery model, we can base our contracts on value and outcomes instead of throwing more bodies at problems. This approach allows us to deliver breakthrough results while lowering both cost and time to deliver, all while educating our clients on how to use common-sense AI approaches to leave more time for creative and strategic work that drives real growth. 
 This is an incredible opportunity to work in an environment where we bring culture and technology together. We believe in our people.

About The Company
